fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Assert Bigger Number Better™️ during the day. 2 Uses.
- Check a player to find if they have a smaller number than you

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you assert Bigger Number Better™️, the following night, any attacks dealt to a person from a role with a bigger Role # than them will automatically succeed, regardless of whether the killer doesn't have the required attack, is roleblocked, or otherwise hindered.
- You will attack players you check who have a lower Role # than you.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Assure that all players alive have Role #s over x/2, where x is the number of roles introduced so far. This does not include yourself.
